content.description: Magazine advertisement from 1924Courtesy of Duke University Libraries Digital Collections
content.question: Technological development such as that depicted in the advertisement most directly contributed to which of the following trends in the early twentieth century?

choices.label: A greater awareness of regional and national cultures
Increased personal mobility for most Americans
Increased participation in traditional leisure activities
Greater purchasing power for working-class families

content.answer: A greater awareness of regional and national cultures

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
